title: DEPARTING ELO HELL
body:
The time has come... I'm leaving this elo behind. IT'S TIME FOR RANKED PLACEMENTS... 
http://youtu.be/TIxIfDUFh3k?a

replies.body: LOL I got S4 from 8/2 and was B1 last season but bronze isn't that bad its the trolls that make it bad which seem to be a rare species now
That is the truest explanation of Bronze I have ever heard {{champion:432}} Not going to lie though that shit did break me when I saw B2.

> [{quoted}](name=KEGGLES,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=juZPaF1e,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-04-03T12:55:04.874+0000)
>
> That is the truest explanation of Bronze I have ever heard {{champion:432}} Not going to lie though that shit did break me when I saw B2.

yeah you should've at least got b1 or even S5

Now if you play like that consistently through the entire season instead of just the first 10 matches you'll get where you want to.

Best of luck
Haha easier said then done :) Thanks for the advice and the view/ support.

how it is "easier said than done" ??

you had a massive win rate during your promos, why? because you had a positive mentality!
you were focused on winning and working in a team to achieve victory and improve yourself.

if your in bronze, its because you belong there.
i just see excuses.
or your scrub teammates are keeping you down, gg.
